Create a DIY jewelry organizer by using corkscrews as hooks to hang necklaces and bracelets on a wall or board.
Use a corkscrew as a makeshift phone stand by wrapping the handle around your phone and securing it in place.
Create a corkscrew by gluing several corkscrews together to form a unique piece of wall art.
Use a corkscrew as a plant holder by twisting the handle into a loop and securing it to a pot or planter.
Create a corkscrew by using corkscrews to make a unique light fixture or chandelier.
